trans-unit.source: Provides mappings between code entities in .NET Framework Web service methods and the content of Web Services Description Language (WSDL) messages that are defined for SOAP Web services.
trans-unit.target: Tilbyr tilordninger mellom koden i .NET Framework metoder for og innholdet i Web Services beskrivelse språket (WSDL)-meldinger som er definert i SOAP-webtjenester.

trans-unit.source: The XmlReflectionMember class is not used directly.
trans-unit.target: Klassen XmlReflectionMember brukes ikke direkte.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is used: - To initialize <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> objects while the .NET Framework is initializing a SOAP Web service or client.
trans-unit.target: I stedet den brukes: – initialisere <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>objekter under .NET Framework er oppstart av SOAP-webtjenesten eller klienten.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: - By the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class while <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> creates <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects from classes that are identified as SOAP Web services.
trans-unit.target: -Ved den <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>klassen under <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>oppretter <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>objekter fra klasser som er identifisert som SOAP-webtjenester.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>

trans-unit.source: During reflection of a SOAP Web service method, arrays of XmlReflectionMember objects are produced that represent the contents of WSDL message definitions.
trans-unit.target: Under gjenspeilingen av SOAP-Web service metoden produseres matriser med XmlReflectionMember objekter som representerer innholdet i WSDL meldingen definisjoner.

trans-unit.source: An array is produced for each of the following items that belong to a SOAP Web service method: - Input parameters.
trans-unit.target: En matrise er angitt for hver av de følgende elementene som tilhører en SOAP Web service-metode:-inndataparametere.

trans-unit.source: - Output parameters and return values.
trans-unit.target: -Returnere parametere og returnere verdier.

trans-unit.source: - Request SOAP headers via attributes.
trans-unit.target: -Forespørselen SOAP-topptekster via attributter.

trans-unit.source: - Response SOAP headers via attributes.
trans-unit.target: -SOAP-svarhoder via attributter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionImporter> classes translate an XmlReflectionMember array into an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> that contains an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping> collection, for further processing.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>og <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionImporter>klasser oversett tabelldata XmlReflectionMember til en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>som inneholder en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping>samling for videre behandling.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember"></xref> represents a Web service method return value, as opposed to an output parameter.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember"> </xref> representerer en Web service-metoden returverdi, i motsetning til en output-parameter.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember> class and its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å bruke den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>klassen og egenskapene direkte.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the member represents a Web service return value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, hvis medlemmet representerer en Web service returverdi; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the Web service method member for this mapping.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på medlemmet Web service-metoden for denne tilordningen.

trans-unit.source: The Web service method member may be an input parameter, an output parameter, a return type, an input header, or an output header.
trans-unit.target: Medlemmet Web service-metoden kan være en inndataparameter, en utdataparameter, en returtype, en inndata-overskrift eller en output-overskrift.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember> class and its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å bruke den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>klassen og egenskapene direkte.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> class for the cases when a member corresponds to a `<part>` element defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>klasse for tilfeller der medlem tilsvarer en `<part>` elementet definert i et dokument Web Services beskrivelse språket (WSDL).</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>

trans-unit.source: Note, however, that with a wrapped binding between a WSDL operation and a .NET Framework method (indicated by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle> enumeration member), the method parameters and return value do not appear in the WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: Vær oppmerksom på som med en innpakket binding mellom en WSDL-operasjon og .NET Framework-metoden (angitt av den <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle>opplisting medlemmet), metodeparametere og returverdien ikke vises i WSDL-dokumentet.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle>

trans-unit.source: When a Web service method is being reflected, the return type's MemberName property becomes the method name (made unique from other member names, if necessary) with "Result" appended.
trans-unit.target: Når en tjeneste-metode som vises, må returtypen medlemsnavn egenskapen blir metodenavnet (laget unike fra andre medlemsnavn om nødvendig) med "Resultat" legges.

trans-unit.source: The name of the Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den service-metoden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the Web service method member code entity that is represented by this mapping.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir enhetstypen av Web service-metoden medlem kode som representeres av denne tilordningen.

trans-unit.source: The Web service method member's code entity may be an input parameter, an output parameter, a return type, or a SOAP header attribute.
trans-unit.target: Web service-metoden medlemmets koden enheten kan være en inndataparameter, en utdataparameter, en returtype eller et attributt for SOAP-hodet.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember> class and its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å bruke den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>klassen og egenskapene direkte.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> class for the cases when a member corresponds to a part element defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>klasse for tilfeller der et medlem som tilsvarer et delelement som er definert i et dokument Web Services beskrivelse språket (WSDL).</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping>

trans-unit.source: Note, however, that with a wrapped binding between a WSDL operation and a .NET Framework method (indicated by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle> enumeration member), the method parameters and return value do not appear in the WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: Vær oppmerksom på som med en innpakket binding mellom en WSDL-operasjon og .NET Framework-metoden (angitt av den <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle>opplisting medlemmet), metodeparametere og returverdien ikke vises i WSDL-dokumentet.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the Web service method member code entity that is represented by this mapping.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>Web service-metoden medlem koden enheten som representeres av denne tilordningen.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the value of the corresponding XML element definition's `isNullable` attribute is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir som verdien for den tilsvarende XML elementdefinisjonens `isNullable` attributtet <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This setting overrides the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Denne innstillingen overstyrer den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A>for den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>attributtet.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is set to `true` only when a SOAP header's type is neither <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> nor <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapUnknownHeader>.
trans-unit.target: Det er satt til `true` bare når et SOAP-hode type er verken <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>eller <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapUnknownHeader>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapUnknownHeader> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember> class and its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å bruke den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>klassen og egenskapene direkte.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to override the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable*> property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>å overstyre den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable*>egenskapen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> with the collection of SOAP-related attributes that have been applied to the member code entity.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> med samlingen av SOAP-relaterte attributter som er brukt i medlemmet koden enheten.

trans-unit.source: The Web service method member's code entity may be an input parameter, an output parameter, a return type, an input SOAP header attribute, or an output SOAP header attribute.
trans-unit.target: Web service-metoden medlemmets koden enheten kan være inndataparameter, en utdataparameter, en returtype, et inndata SOAP-overskrift attributt eller attributtet utdata SOAP-overskrift.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember> class and its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å bruke den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>klassen og egenskapene direkte.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"></xref> that contains the objects that represent SOAP attributes applied to the member.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes"> </xref> som inneholder objekter som representerer SOAP-attributter som brukes til medlem.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> with the collection of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>-related attributes that have been applied to the member code entity.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>med samlingen av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>-relaterte attributter som er brukt i medlemmet koden enheten.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The Web service method member's code entity may be an input parameter, an output parameter, a return type, an input SOAP header attribute, or an output SOAP header attribute.
trans-unit.target: Web service-metoden medlemmets koden enheten kan være inndataparameter, en utdataparameter, en returtype, et inndata SOAP-overskrift attributt eller attributtet utdata SOAP-overskrift.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember> class and its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å bruke den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>klassen og egenskapene direkte.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> that represents XML attributes that have been applied to the member code.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>som representerer XML-attributter som er brukt på medlemskoden.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>
